name: Toño The Miner Mole
description:
Are you ready to join Toño on his epic journey of destruction and discovery? In Toño The Miner Mole, you'll take control of the adorable Toño as he barrels through obstacles and collects fuel to break through walls and reach new distances.

With an unquenchable spirit and an unstoppable cart (kinda), Toño needs your help to smash through as many walls as possible. Can you guide him to new heights and surpass all expectations?

This is our first foray into the gaming world, and we're thrilled to be sharing our creation with you. We've poured our hearts and souls into every detail, and we can't wait to hear your feedback. Join us on this exciting adventure, and let's break some walls together!
